ðŸ“– Summary: Dashy is a self-hosted dashboard application that allows users to organize their self-hosted services and applications in one central location. It offers features such as real-time status monitoring, widgets for displaying dynamic content, customizable themes and layouts, and various authentication options. Dashy aims to provide a user-friendly and efficient way to manage and access various self-hosted services.
